definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)

sentences.english: Jubilantly they field into the classroom. The professor passedoutthe papers.
sentences.chinese: 他們歡快地進了考場，教授把考卷發給他們。

sentences.english: Past exams from the LSAT are all released.
sentences.chinese: 以前的LSAT考卷都是公開的。

sentences.english: The next class the professor handed the tests back out.
sentences.chinese: 下次上課時，教授將考卷發下去。

sentences.english: No. Candidates may use only their question book for calculations and scratch work.
sentences.chinese: 不行，考生只能使用他們的考卷來做爲草稿紙計算。

sentences.english: Somehow in the travel, I lost five of them.
sentences.chinese: 但是不知怎麼的，在旅行途中，我弄丟了五份考卷。

sentences.english: When she saw the examination paper, she got a nasty shock.
Xiao Ming feels nervous each time he takes a math exam.
sentences.chinese: 小明一看見數學考卷就犯怵。

sentences.english: He said, "The examination papers are now in the hands of the printer.
sentences.chinese: 他說道，“考卷已經在印刷工手裏了。

sentences.english: All the examination papers should be handed out before Friday.
sentences.chinese: 所有考卷都應在星期五前分發出去。

sentences.english: Please distribute the examination papers to all the students.
sentences.chinese: 請把考卷分發給所有的同學。

sentences.english: If you spoil your paper, intentionally or accidentally.
sentences.chinese: 如果你故意或無意地污損考卷。

sentences.english: Some people can easily produce everything they know on a test.
sentences.chinese: 如若做一份考卷，熟悉相關知識的人可以一揮而就。

sentences.english: The teacher distributed the examination papers round the class.
sentences.chinese: 老師給全班學生分發考卷。

sentences.english: The teacher marked our examination papers and returned them tous .
sentences.chinese: 老師給我們的考卷打了分，然後發還給我們。

sentences.english: He answered the examination paper quite well.
Happyly they crouded into the classroom. The professor passed out the papers.
sentences.chinese: 他們歡快地進了考場，教授把考卷發給他們。

definition: to correct student papers/to grade exam papers
see 考試卷|考试卷[kao3 shi4 juan4]
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
to draw up the theme (for discussion)
